thread.title: Highlander for Suresh Mahindra Trophy
thread.title_full: Highlander for Suresh Mahindra Trophy - Sports

author: Prakash Gosavi
title: Highlander for Suresh Mahindra Trophy
text:
PUNE: The longest race in the country's racing calendar, Suresh Mahindra Trophy to be ridden over two miles, is slated as the prime event of Saturday's eight-race card.
There are only five runners in the fray, of which Rodeo and Highlander are expected to fight at the end of the 3,200-meter trip. The latter, thanks mainly to the in-form Trevor Patel who will assist him in the saddle, is expected to score.
First race at 1.30 pm.
Selections:
Self Styled Plate - Div II (Class V; 2000m)
Red Fort 1, Striking Story 2, Resilient 3.
Kojagiri Plate - Div II (Class IV; 1200m)
Stroganoff 1, Reality 2, Miracle Of Love 3.
Self Styled Plate - Div I (Class V; 2000m)
Cavalia 1, Stalwart 2, Jordana 3.
Jonty Rhodes Plate (Class II; 1200m)
Ageless 1, Strategic Move 2, Egyptiana 3.
E d'Avoine Trophy (For 3y, maidens; 1600m)
Nifty 1, Champagne 2, Dancing Pretty 3.
Kojagiri Plate - Div I (Class IV; 1200m)
Magnum Opus 1, Hirohama 2, Kaleidoscope 3.
Yogender Singh Trophy (Class IV; 1400m)
Make Way For Me 1, Bubbly Bellini 2, Hypothesis 3.
Suresh Mahindra Trophy (Class I; 3200m)
Highlander 1, Rodeo 2.
Recommendations
Best bet: None
Good bet: Nifty (5-9)
Chance bet: Make Way For Me (7-1)
Upset: Flynn (2-4)
Today's pools
Super jackpot pool: 2,3,4,5,6,7
Jackpot pool: 3,4,5,6,7
Treble pool: I - 5,6,7; II - 6,7,8
Tanala pool: All races.
